quotes.quote: An exit-door procedure at 30.000 feet. Mm-hmm. The illusion of safety...
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: The things you own end up owning you.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote:
You wanted a way to change your life. You could not do this on your own. All the ways you wish you could be... That's me.
            I look like you wanna look, I fuck like you wanna fuck. I am smart, capable and, most importantly... I'm free in all the ways that you are not.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: We've had a near-life experience!
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote:
— You know why they put oxygen masks on planes?
            — So you can breathe.
            — Oxygen gets you high. In a catastrophic emergency, you take giant panic breaths. Suddenly you become euphoric, docile. You accept your fate. It's all right here. Emergency water landing, 600mph. Blank faces. Calm as hindu cows.
            — That's um... That's an interesting theory.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: The things you own end up owning you.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: What are we, then? We're consumers. We are by-products of a lifestyle obsession. Murder, crime, poverty. These things don't concern me. What concerns me are celebrity magazines... Television with 500 channels... Some guy's name on my underwear.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: We go to jobs we hate to buy stuff we don't need. (We work in shit to buy shit.)
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: You wanna make an omelet, you gotta break some eggs.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Stop trying to control everything and just let go! Let go!
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: We have no great war. No great depression. Our great war is a spiritual war. Our great depression is our lives.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: "Getting fired," Tyler says, "is the best thing that could happen to any of us. That way, we'd quit treading water and do something with our lives."
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Now, a question of etiquette – as I pass, do I give you the ass or the crotch?
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: You are not a beautiful or unique snowflake.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: We're a generation of men raised by women. I'm wondering if another woman is really the answer we need.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: I'm tired of watching only professionals. I don't want to die without any scars.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: "Sticking feathers up your butt," Tyler says, "does not make you a chicken."
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: You are not your job. You're not how much money you have in the bank. You're not the car you drive. You're not the contents of your wallet. You're not your fucking khakis. You're the all-singing, all-dancing crap of the world.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: With enough soap, one could blow up just about anything.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Sticking feathers up your butt does not make you a chicken.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Not like death as a sad, downer thing, this was going to be death as a cheery, empowering thing.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: You're the all-singing, all-dancing crap of the world.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Self-improvement is masturbation. Now, self-destruction…
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: I'm keeping your license. I know where you live. I'm going to check on you. If you aren't back in school on your way to being a veterinarian, you will be dead.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: "If Marilyn Monroe were alive right now, what would she be doing?"(...) The headliner hangs down in shreds from the ceiling and Tyler says, "Clawing at the lid of her coffin."
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: You created me. I didn't create some loser alter ego to make me feel better. Take some responsibility.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote:
— What do you do for a living?
            — Soap.
            — Sorry?
            — I make and I sell soap. The yardstick of civilization.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: We are God's middle children, with no special place in history and no special attention. Unless we get God's attention, we have no hope of damnation or redemption.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Your father was your model for God. And if your father bails out, what does that tell you about God?
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote:
— Is that your blood?
            — *Some* of it, yeah.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Tyler says, "We won't really die."
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote:
— I wanna know what you're thinking.
            — Fuck what you know! Forget about what you think you know about life, friendship... And especially about you and me.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Pull a lever. Push a button. You don't understand any of it, and then you just die.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: "Getting fired," Tyler says, "is the best thing that could happen to any of us. That way, we'd quit treading water and do something with our lives."
quotes.author: Tyler Durden
